project.description:
This feature contains only the product plugin for the default open-source Yamcs Studio distribution. We need this maven artefact, so that we can add it as an included feature to the *.product file.
Do NOT combine this into the core feature, because we want the core feature to be easily reusable WITHOUT including the product configuration. This has two advantages: - easier to include core feature branding in derived products - the default product plugin could crash a derived product if it also attempts to define this.
